Description: Alyssa Hamilton must uncover the secrets of her family's bloodline while she is pursued by deranged killers throughout different time periods in this survival horror adventure.

Title: Nicktoons: Attack of the Toybots
Description: Play as your favorite Nickelodeon cartoon characters as you take on the evil toy bots.

Title: Cabela's Deer Hunt: 2005 Season
Description: The sequel to the original Deer Hunt game.

Title: Puzzle Challenge: Crosswords And More!
Description: Includes various puzzles including crosswords, codebreakers, word search, and more.

Title: Angelique Trois
Description: The third game in the popular Angelique series of otome dating sims.

Title: Wizardry Summoner
Description: Wizardry Summoner is an Japanese only entry to the classic RPG series, released for the Game Boy Advance in 2001.

Title: Guitar Hero: Smash Hits
Description: Guitar Hero: Smash Hits is a compilation of some of the most popular songs from previous titles. This time, all songs are master recordings, and there is full band support for each track.

Title: Nightshade
Description: Hibana, a government ninja is tasked with defending Japan from hellspawn and collecting the pieces of the cursed sword Akujiki after the events of Shinobi on PS2.

Title: Winning Post 4: Maximum
Description: Koei's horse-racing franchise gallops onto PS2.

Title: College Hoops 2K8
Description: The latest and possible the last in the College 2K series. Many improvements are subtle, but the changes and additions to College Hoops 2K8 make it the best game in the series.

Title: The Adventures of Darwin
Description: The Adventures of Darwin is a Real-Time Strategy Puzzle game in the mold of Pikmin or Lemmings, created by Vingt-et-un Systems for the PS2.

Title: The Tōbō Prisoner: Ross City Shinjitsu eno 10-Jikan
Description: An action stealth game in the Simple 2000 series.

Title: Kessen III
Description: The third game in Koei's Kessen series depicts a fictionalized and romanticized version of the life of Nobunaga Oda.

Title: Devil Kings
Description: Known as Sengoku Basara in Japan, Devil Kings is a hack-and-slash action game set during the Warring States era of Japanese history.

Title: Sanyo Pachinko Paradise 8: Shin Umi Monogatari
Description: Sanyo Pachinko Paradise 8: Shin Umi Monogatari is the third PS2 installment of Irem's venerable pachislot simulator series. It's also the first game to feature the Pachipro Fūunroku story mode.

Title: Black Market Bowling
Description: Black Market Bowling is a European only bowling game for the Playstation 2.

Title: Home Maid: Owari no Tachi
Description: Japanese adventure game for PS2.

Title: Alpine Skiing 2005
Description: Alpine Skiing 2005 is a Skiing game by Midas Interactive Entertainment.

Title: World Super Police
Description: World Super Police is a cops vs. robbers game.

Title: World Championship Rugby
Description: Arcade style Rugby game

Title: The Battle of YuYu Hakusho: Shitou! Ankoku Bujutsukai! 120%
Description: A 3D Fighting game, developed by Dimps Corporation and published by Banpresto, which was released in Japan in 2007.

Title: YuYu Hakusho Forever
Description: A PlayStation 2 game based on the manga and anime YuYu Hakusho.

Title: One Piece: Pirates' Carnival
Description: One Piece: Pirates' Carnival is a PlayStation 2 and GameCube action game based on the One Piece anime series.

Title: Steambot Chronicles
Description: Steambot Chronicles is a game originally released for the PS2 in Japan under the name Bumpy Trot. The game's main focus is on Trotmobiles, mechs used to do a large variety of things in the world of Steambot Chronicles.

Title: Shin Seiki Evangelion: Ayanami Ikusei Keikaku with Asuka Hokan Keikaku
Description: You are a member of NERV tasked with caring for and raising Rei or Asuka and preparing them to fight the Angels attacking Tokyo-3. Taking the system first seen in Princess Maker, Gainax introduces their Evangelion twist to it.

Title: Vexx
Description: Vexx is a 3D platformer developed by Acclaim's Austin Studio (formerly Iguana Entertainment). The design borrowed liberally from open-world platformers like Super Mario 64, but with tough competition from new franchises Rachet & Clank and Jak & Daxter, Vexx had a difficult time making a blip on the radar.

Title: Rock Band: Country Track Pack
Description: Rock Band Country Track Pack is a standalone game that wraps up 21 country songs into one retail package.  The songs are a collection of previously released DLC, as well as new tracks that have yet to appear in any Rock Band game.

Title: Rock Band: Metal Track Pack
Description: Rock Band Metal Track Pack is a standalone game that packages up 20 metal songs from Rock Band's library.  It includes songs from Black Tide, Judas Priest, Rage Against The Machine, and more.

Title: The Sum of All Fears
Description: Tactical military shooter based on the film of the same title, which is based on the novel by Tom Clancy.

Title: Telly Addicts
Description: Based on the TV show of the same name.

Title: Unlimited SaGa
Description: Unlimited SaGa is a Japanese RPG with experimental (even for a SaGa game) gameplay akin to tabletop RPGs

Title: Naruto: Ultimate Ninja
Description: Naruto: Ultimate Ninja is the first Naruto fighting game on the PS2.

Title: Splatter Master
Description: Splatter Master is a somewhat gory side-scrolling brawler on the PS2 developed by Vingt-et-un Systems.

Title: One Piece: Grand Battle
Description: One Piece: Grand Battle is a fighting game in which players take control of characters from the uber popular anime and manga series, One Piece, and duke it out.

Title: Next Generation Tennis
Description: Next Generation Tennis is a tennis sports game that featured the licenses of the Roland Garros and The US Open tournaments.

Title: Cocoto Platform Jumper
Description: Cocoto makes his first appearance in a platform game.

Title: Gran Turismo Concept: 2002 Tokyo-Geneva
Description: This edition of Gran Turismo was used exclusively for the 2002 Tokyo-Geneva Auto Show.

Title: Fatal Frame III: The Tormented
Description: A young woman whose fiance recently died finds herself in a ghostly manor when she falls asleep, only to be stalked by a woman's tattoo-covered spirit.

Title: Fatal Frame II: Crimson Butterfly
Description: When they visit a spot where they used to play as children, the twin sisters Mio and Mayu suddenly find themselves in a village where night is eternal. With only a magic camera to defend themselves, they have to solve the village's mystery while defending themselves from evil spirits.

Title: The Adventures of Cookie & Cream
Description: The Adventures of Cookie & Cream is a cooperative puzzle platformer where two rabbits must overcome obstacles in order to restore the world's moon.

Title: The Suffering:  Ties That Bind
Description: The Suffering: Ties That Bind is a sequel of the action-oriented horror game; The Suffering.  It picks up the story immediately where the last one left of and features the same engine as the last game with improve graphics and gameplay elements.

Title: Arabians Lost: The Engagement on Desert
Description: An otome dating sim RPG about an Arabian princess who makes a bet with her parents to avoid an arranged marriage. Can she raise 10 million gold in 25 days, or will she be forced to give up the dream of love?

Title: Cowboy Bebop: Tsuioku no Yakyoku
Description: It's a new adventure for the Bebop crew as they pursue new outlaws and criminals across the solar system.

Title: Space Raiders
Description: Space Raiders is an updated version of the classic Space Invaders game.

Title: Heartbeat Boxing
Description: Heartbeat Boxing is a boxing simulator featuring an all-female cast.

Title: ESPN NFL 2K5
Description: NFL 2K5 continued the NFL 2K series with an improved presentation featuring ESPN personalities such as Chris Berman, Trey Wingo, and Suzy Kolber.

Title: EyeToy: Play
Description: Be on the big screen with Eyetoy: Play.  This mini-game collection uses the Eyetoy to put you in the game.

Title: Ayakashibito
Description: A visual novel by Propeller.

Title: Boxing Champions
Description: PS2 Boxing game

Title: Pink Pong
Description: Pink Pong is a ping pong game released in Japan and Europe for the PS2.

Title: Love ★ Smash! 5
Description: Love ★ Smash! 5 is an all-female tennis simulator.

Title: Simple 2000 Series Ultimate Vol. 26: Love ★ Smash! 5.1: Tennis Robo no Hanran
Description: HuneX and D3 Publisher bring back more eccentric female tennis action in Love ★ Smash! 5.1

Title: Deep Water
Description: This is a video game released in Europe by 505 GameStreet (now called 505 Games).

Title: Realm of the Dead
Description: Realm of the Dead is a zombie-killing action game.

Title: Spectral Force Radical Elements
Description: Japan-only release that focuses more on huge armies rather than a small group of heroes.

Title: Chaos Wars
Description: This tactical, turn-based strategy game from Idea Factory features a dream team of Japanese game characters from Shadow Hearts, Growlanser, Spectral Souls, and Gungrave.  Lead a specialized team to defeat the evil that caused such a crazy crossover, and restore order to the many universes this danger threatens.

Title: Sorayume
Description: Horror themed otome game.

Title: Family Feud
Description: This version of Family Feud was released for the PC, PS2 and GBA. Atomic Planet developed the GBA version and Ingram Entertainment developed the PS2 and PC versions, all of which were published by Global Star Entertainment.

Title: Sega Superstars Tennis
Description: Classic Sega characters collide on the courts in this arcade-style tennis game.

Title: Yamasa Digi World: Collaboration SP Pachi-Slot Ridge Racer
Description: Yamasa Digi World: Collaboration SP Pachi-Slot Ridge Racer is a pachi-slot game based on Namco's Ridge Racer series.

Title: Yamasa Digi World 4
Description: The final numbered entry in the Yamasa Digi World series.

Title: Yamasa Digi World SP
Description: Yamasa Digi World SP celebrates 10 years of Yamasa's Digital Slot World slot machine line.

Title: Yamasa Digi World 2: LCD Edition
Description: The Yamasa Digi World series makes its debut on PlayStation 2.

Title: Dynasty Warriors 3: Xtreme Legends
Description: Dynasty Warriors 3: Xtreme Legends is a stand-alone expansion.

Title: Jan Sangoku Musou
Description: Mahjong with Dynasty Warriors!

Title: Alias

Title: Twisted Metal: Black ONLINE
Description: An online version of Twisted Metal: Black.

Title: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 62: The Super Puzzle Bobble DX
Description: A compilation of Super Puzzle Bobble and Super Puzzle Bobble 2

Title: Saiyuki Reload Gunlock
Description: Fighting game with the characters of the anime Saiyuki

Title: Saiyuki Reload
Description: An role-playing game based on the Saiyuki Reload anime and manga series.

Title: Yourself Fitness
Description: A fitness training game for PC, Xbox, and PS2.

Title: Crash Nitro Kart
Description: Nitro Kart takes Crash Bandicoot and friends to the streets in this kart-racer with multiple tracks and characters to choose from.

Title: Pro Yakyuu Spirits 5 Kanzenban
Description: This is an updated version of Pro Yakyuu Spirits 5 released after the 2008 NPB season.

Title: The Baseball 2003: Akikigou
Description: Fall version of The Baseball 2003.

Title: Agent Hugo: Hula Holiday
Description: Agent Hugo: Hula Holiday is a 3D Platformer created by NDS Software.

Title: Sonic Mega Collection Plus
Description: Play old school Sonic  with 20 titles to choose from including Sonic the hedgehog and Sonic 3D Flickies Island. Relive the memories in the best Sonic games to come from Sega.

Title: BECK: The Game
Description: Game based on the manga/anime of the same name.

Title: Butt-Ugly Martians: Zoom or Doom

Title: Pro Evolution Soccer 2014

Title: Victorious Boxers: Ippo's Road to Glory
Description: One of the first games to utilize a Bob and Weave mechanic, Victorious boxers is more than a simple anime license cash in.

Title: Psikyo Shooting Collection Vol. 2: Sengoku Ace + Sengoku Blade
Description: A two game compilation that was released as part of the Psikyo Shooting Collection in Japan.

Title: ATV Offroad Fury 3

Title: SingStar
Description: SingStar was the PlayStation 2 game that kicked off a crazy of karaoke sequels for Sony's European division.

Title: In the Groove

Title: 1945 I & II: The Arcade Games

Title: Sunsoft Collection

Title: Worms 3D

Title: Samurai Warriors 2

Title: Alfa Romeo Racing Italiano

Title: David Beckham Soccer
Description: A soccer game for a wide range of platforms, endorsed by the world-famous English footballsman David Beckham.

Title: Cue Academy
Description: A snooker, pool, and billiards game for the PlayStation 2.

Title: Rock Band
Description: Rock Band expands on the concepts Harmonix established in its Guitar Hero franchise by allowing players to play guitar, bass, drums, and sing to a variety of songs from various sub-genres and time periods.

Title: Dance:UK XL Party
Description: The third game in the Dance:UK series.

Title: Dance:UK XL
Description: The third game in the Dance:UK series.

Title: Dance:UK eXtra TraX
Description: The second game in the Dance:UK series.

Title: Hell's Kitchen

Title: SOCOM: U.S. Navy SEALs

Title: Sim Theme Park
Description: The long awaited sequel to Theme Park by Electronic Arts.

Title: AFL Premiership 2006
Description: A playstation 2 game based on the Australian Football League.

Title: AFL Premiership 2005
Description: AFL Premiership 2005 is based on the widely popular sport of Australian Rules Football.

Title: Shin Megami Tensei: Digital Devil Saga

Description: The second in this series is based on two popular real-life pachi-slot machines.

Description: The fourteenth volume of Pachi-Slot Kouryaku on PS2 (and the fourth for DS)

Description: Hisshou Pachinko * Pachi-Slot Kouryoku Series Vol. 5: CR Shinseiki Evangelion 2nd Impact is a pachi-slot game based on Neon Genesis Evangelion

Title: Cabela's Outdoor Adventures

Title: Dance Dance Revolution Disney CHANNEL EDITION

Title: Mojo!

Title: MLB SlugFest 20-04
Description: This is Midway's second game in the Slugfest series.

Title: MLB Slugfest Loaded
Description: The third entry in the MLB SlugFest baseball game series.

Title: NBA Ballers: Phenom
Description: Phenom is the second game in Midway's NBA Ballers series.

Title: NFL Blitz: Pro
Description: NFL Blitz Pro showcases authentic 11-on-11 gameplay with real NFL teams, players and stadiums, while still providing the well-known Midway Sports "edge."

Title: NFL Blitz 20-03
Description: Football with no rules.

Title: Saturday Night Speedway
Description: A racing game for the PS2 and PC released in 2004

Title: Growlanser: Heritage of War
Description: The fifth game in the Growlanser series.

Title: Ghost Master

Title: Hayarigami 2: Toshidensetsu Kaii Jiken

The Foe damages the Earth's defense system, and alters history for the worse. One extraordinary dolphin, Ecco, must travel through time to set things right.

Title: Riding Spirits

Title: Backyard Baseball

Title: GT Racers
Description: A European exclusive racing game.

Title: River King A Wonderful Journey
Description: A Wonderful Journey continues the River King games on home consoles for the first time in the U.S.

Title: The Simpsons: Road Rage

Title: SEGA AGES 2500 Vol.22: Advanced Daisenryaku - Deutch Dengeki Sakusen
Shuyaku wa Zenigata
Description: A Lupin III puzzle game for PS2 and PSP, starring Inspector Zenigata.

Title: Pop Idol: Official Video Game
Description: Game for PlayStation 2

Title: Sengoku Basara 2
Description: Slice through your enemies with the the devastation strength of the Devil Kings.

Title: Final Fantasy XI: Seekers of Adoulin

Title: Top Trumps: Dogs & Dinosaurs

Title: Sonic Riders: Zero Gravity

Title: Pachinko Kamen Rider

Title: Beyond Atlantis II
Description: Released internationally as Atlantis III: The New World

Title: Smuggler's Run

Title: Sengoku Basara 2 Heroes

Title: Bratz: Rock Angelz
Description: A game based on the Bratz series of dolls.

Title: Combat Ace
Description: A flying action game.

Title: Dance Summit 2001
Description: A dancing rhythm-matching & button recognition game with up-beat Japanese music.  PS2 update to the classic Bust a Groove series.

Title: PDC World Championship Darts 2008

Title: PDC World Championship Darts
Description: PDC World Championship Darts is the first installment in the dart franchise.

Title: Sagashi ni Ikouyo
Description: One of the PS2's earliest RPGs, developed and published by Sony Japan.

Title: Endonesia
Description: A role-playing game by Vanpool.

Title: Slam Tennis
Description: A tennis game from Infogrames that was never released in the US.

Title: Remote Control Dandy SF

Title: Triple Play Baseball
Description: A baseball game from Treyarch and EA Sports.

Title: NFL 2K3

Title: Hakuoki: Demon of the Fleeting Blossom

Title: Truck Racer

Title: MVP Baseball 2004
Description: MVP Baseball 2004 is the second game in the MVP franchise. The game built upon the successes of the original while including new features such as the addition of Minor League affiliates.

Title: L no Kisetsu 2: Invisible Memories

Title: FIFA 12

Title: Angelique Etoile
Description: The fourth installment in the popular Angelique series.

Title: Petanque Pro
Description: Petanque Pro is a Pétanque game by Mere Mortals.

Title: Pachi-Slot King! Kagaku Ninja-Tai Gatchaman

Title: Summon Night Granthese: Horobi no Tsurugi to Yakusoku no Kishi
Description: An action RPG for PS2 set in the Summon Night universe.

Title: Metal Saga

Title: Growlanser VI: Precarious World
Description: The sixth game in the Growlanser series.

Title: Growlanser III: The Dual Darkness
Description: The third game in the Growlanser series.

Title: Growlanser Collection

Title: Growlanser II: The Sense of Justice

Title: Super Robot Wars Original Generation Gaiden

Title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX Tag Force 2

Title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Description: The tie-in game of the film of the same title. Return to Hogwarts to help Harry survive a fraught sixth year in Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince.

Title: Rakushou! Pachi-Slot Sengen 3

Title: Rakushou! Pachi-Slot Sengen 4

Title: Rakushou! Pachi-Slot Sengen 2
Description: Rakushou! Pachi-Slot Sengen 2 is the second in the Rakushou! Pachi-Slot Sengen console series.

Title: Rakushou! Pachi-Slot Sengen
Description: Rakushou! Pachi-Slot Sengen is a compilation of several pachi-slot games.

Title: Rakushou! Pachi-Slot Sengen 6: Rio 2 Cruising Vanadis

Description: Rakushou! Pachi-Slot Sengen 5: Rio Paradise is a pachi-slot game featuring Rio Rollins Tachibana.

Title: Memories Off

Title: Daito Giken Koushiki Pachislot Simulator: 24- Twenty-Four
Description: The hit TV American television drama about terrorism countering returns to the PS2 once more in the form of a themed Japanese gambling simulator.

Title: London Racer: World Challenge

Title: Gunfighter II: Revenge of Jesse James

Title: Top Gear RPM Tuning
Description: A low budget street racing game with a focus on customisation.

Title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Journey to Jaburo
Description: Fight the war during the Mobile Suit Gundam series.  A direct prequel to Mobile Suit Gundam: Zeonic Front.

Title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Dream Carnival

Title: Dance Dance Revolution X
Description: Connect up to four PS2s on a LAN and enter the Party Zone with up to eight players.

Title: Kart Racer
Description: This creatively-titled go-kart racing simulation for the Nintendo Wii includes go-karts from the 60cc, 125cc and 250cc classes and 15 different courses from around the world. The game is a partner to the similarly-titled Truck Racer.

Title: Night Wizard: The Video Game: Denial of the World
Description: A visual novel tie-in to the Night Wizard anime.

Title: Your Memories Off: Girl's Style
Description: A otome spin-off to the Memories Off series.

Title: Umisho
Description: A visual novel based on the Kenko Zenrakei Suieibu Umisho manga, about the wacky swim team at the Umineko Shougyou High School.

Title: Que ~Ancient Leaf no Yousei~
Description: A PlayStation 2 visual novel and 5pb's first venture into making games.

Title: Nobunaga no Yabou Online
Description: MMORPG based on Koei's long running Nobunaga's Ambition franchise. Launched in 2003 on the PlayStation 2, it will soon move to it's third generation of Sony hardware when the PlayStation 4 version debuts.

Title: Xenosaga: Episode I - Der Wille zur Macht
Description: The first episode in the Xenosaga trilogy released for the Playstation 2.

Title: Hudson Selection Vol. 4: Takahashi Meijin no Bouken Jima
Description: Hudson Selection Vol. 4: Takahashi Meijin no Bouken Jima is an enhanced remake of the original Takahashi Meijin no Bouken Jima ("Adventure Island") game.

Title: Hudson Selection Vol. 3: PC Genjin
Description: Hudson Selection Vol. 3: PC Genjin is a cel-shaded remake of PC Genjin ("Bonk's Adventure")

Title: Hudson Selection Volume 1: Cubic Lode Runner
Description: Isometric puzzle/action game.  Released exclusively in Japan for the Nintendo Gamecube and the Playstation 2.

Title: Hiiro no Kakera
Description: A visual novel otome game by Idea Factory.

Title: The Getaway: Black Monday
Description: Black Monday is a third person action game, set in London, and exclusive to the Playstation 2

Title: DreamWorks' Shark Tale
Description: A game based on the movie of the same name.

Title: Initial D: Takahashi Ryosuke no Typing Saisoku Riron
Description: Initial D: Takahashi Ryosuke no Typing Saisoku Riron is a typing tutor game for the PlayStation 2, based on the Initial D anime.

Title: Mahjong Taikai III
Description: Mahjong Taikai III is the PlayStation 2 entry in Koei's mahjong series.

Title: Scandal
Description: An adventure game developed by Sugar & Rockets with cut-scenes animated by Production I.G. Scandal is also technically the 5th entry in the Yarudora series.

Title: Blood: The Last Vampire - Last Volume
Description: The final volume of a two part full motion adventure game based off Blood: The Last Vampire. Both parts are the 6th installment of the Yarudora series.

Title: Bee Movie Game
Description: Based on the animated motion picture, Bee Movie Game allows you to play as Barry B. Benson in a sandbox gameplay setting.

Title: Ghosthunter
Description: Ghosthunter is a horror themed third person shooter which has you cast as newly appointed ghost hunter Lazarus Jones. Having unwittingly released hundreds of ghosts from a special vault, Lazarus must explore a myriad of haunted locales to fix his mistake and save his abducted partner.

Title: Keyboardmania II: 2ndMIX and 3rdMIX
Description: Keyboardmania II combines the second and third arcade releases of the Keyboardmania series.

Title: G1 Jockey 3
Description: G1 Jockey 3 is a thoroughbred horse racing simulation video game produced by Koei for the PlayStation 2. Although the G1 Jockey series had been gaining popularity in Japan, this was the first game in the series to be released in North America. In contrast to Tecmo's Gallop Racer series, which focuses on every aspect of horse racing (including breeding), G1 Jockey 3 focuses solely on the jockey.

Title: Lucky Star: Ryouou Gakuen Outousai
Description: Lucky Star: Ryouou Gakuen Outousai is a visual novel featuring characters from the four-panel manga and anime Lucky Star.

Title: Pro Evolution Soccer Management
Description: Football management game based on the 2005/2006 season. Featuring 6 of the top leagues from Europe.

Title: NBA Jam
Description: Acclaim's attempt to revive the classic arcade game for PS2 and Xbox.

Title: Commandos: Strike Force
Description: The first Commandos game to implement the famous 2D gameplay in a 3D setting. Fight the Axis in several Theaters of War using three different characters, The Beret, The Sniper and The Spy.

Title: Dynasty Warriors 6
Description: Dynasty Warriors 6 is the latest in a long line of Dynasty Warriors game. The missions are adapted from the 14th century novel Romance of The Three Kingdoms written by Luo Guanzhong.

Title: MDK 2
Description: A sequel to Shiny's MDK. MDK 2 is developed by Bioware and notably when compared to the first game, you get to play as all three main characters this time. Published by Interplay and released in 2000. An HD remake is currently available on Steam.

Title: Space Invaders Anniversary
Description: Space Invaders Anniversary celebrates the 25th anniversary of the oldest Taito franchise.

Title: Football Kingdom Trial Edition
Description: Football Kingdom: Trial Edition is a soccer game developed by Namco, released in Japan for the Playstation 2 in 2004.

Title: Sven-Göran Eriksson's World Manager
Description: Sven-Göran Eriksson's World Manager is a soccer management game featuring Sven-Göran Eriksson.

Title: Adventures of Pinocchio
Description: Adventures of Pinocchio is a game for the Wii

Title: Fire Heroes
Description: Fire fighting game for the PlayStation 2. There are 30 floors in Clayton Tower for you to explore, your goal being to rescue as many survivors as possible.

Title: Super Robot Taisen: Scramble Commander
Description: Super Robot Taisen: Scramble Commander comes from the series Super Robot Taisen and it's the first HD entry.

Title: Moe Moe 2-ji Daisenryaku 2 [chu～♪]
Description: The second in the Moe Moe World War II offshoot of the Daisenryaku series of strategy games, where WWII is reimagined with anime girl-based units.

Title: Missing Parts Side B: The Tantei Stories
Description: A PlayStation 2 compilation of the second and third "Missing Parts" games.

Title: Missing Parts Side A: The Tantei Stories
Description: A PlayStation 2 remake of the first "Missing Parts" game.

Title: Moe Moe 2-ji Daisenryaku
Description: Take Europe with storm using your very own army of Nazi cuties, in this offshoot of the Daisenryaku series of turn-based strategy games.

Title: Mai-Otome: Otome Butou Shi
Description: A fighting game based on the My-Otome anime series.

Title: Mai-HiME: Unmei no Keitouju
Description: A visual novel based on the My-Hime anime series, offering an alternate take on the plot.

Title: Shikigami no Shiro: Nanayozuki Gensoukyoku
Description: A visual novel shooter spin-off to the Castle of Shikigami series.

Title: Ultraman
Description: Ultraman is a 2004 fighting game for the Sony PlayStation 2, based on the original Ultraman series.

Title: Major League Baseball 2K12
Description: The next installment of 2K's baseball sim.

Title: Lucinda Green's Equestrian Challenge
Description: Lucinda Green's Equestrian Challenge is a horseback riding game for the PS2 and PC.

Title: Code Geass: Lost Colors
Description: A visual novel/dating sim based on the popular anime Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion.

Title: NCAA Football 2002
Description: Featured Chris Weinke on the cover, Flordia State quaterback and Heisman Trophy winner.

Title: J-League Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou! 3
Description: Released in 2003 for the PlayStation 2.

Title: J-League Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou! '04
Description: The fourth entry in Sega's J-League soccer management simulator.

Title: Let's Make a Soccer Team!
Description: A  RGG-tinged football management with a penchant for exclamation points. It is centred around the 06/07 soccer season in 10 different countries. It was released by Sega and Konami in Europe on August 25, 2006.

Title: Auto Modellista
Description: Auto Modellista is a cel-shaded, self-titled "driving simulator" by Capcom.

Title: Shepherd's Crossing
Description: Shepherd's Crossing is a strategy, simulation game that mixes elements of games from the Harvest Moon and Animal Crossing franchises. Trading and hunting also add to the mix!

Title: Tokobot Plus: Mysteries of the Karakuri
Description: Tokobot Plus: Mysteries of the Karakuri is an enhanced version of the puzzle-heavy PSP platformer, which stars Bolt, a young boy who dreams of becoming a Treasure Master one day.

Title: FIFA Soccer 2003
Description: It's a soccer game!

Title: Guitar Freaks & DrumMania: Masterpiece Gold
Description: Japanese only release by konami

Title: RoboCop
Description: Go behind the visor as players take the role of RoboCop, clearing the streets of Neo Detroit from crime.

Title: Viewtiful Joe 2
Description: Use Joe and Silvia's Viewtiful powers to save Movieland from the accursed Gedow!

Title: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2004
Description: Released on July 14, 2003.  Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2004 is the first Tiger Woods game to feature the Gameface (create a player) feature, as well as online play for the PS2 edition.

Title: Pro Yakyuu Spirits 2004 Climax
Description: This is an updated version of Pro Yakyuu Spirits 2004 released for the post season.

Title: Asterix at the Olympic Games
Description: A video game based around French cartoon character Asterix attending the Olympics.

Title: G1 Jockey 4
Description: G1 Jockey 4 lets players take the reins and experience the feeling of being a top racehorse jockey. This fourth game in the hugely popular series introduces a new ranking system and abilities, as well a revolutionary analogue control system.

Title: Sengoku Hime: Senran no Yo ni Honoo Tatsu
Description: Once upon a time, a long-time maker of serious strategy games came up with the idea of filling their games with waifus.

Title: Sengoku Hime 2: Senran no Yo, Gunyuu Arashi no Gotoku
Description: Strategy game set in feudal Japan, reimagined with anime girls.

Title: Disney Golf
Description: Disney Golf is a spiritual successor to Swing Away Golf, themed with Disney characters.

Title: RedCard 20-03
Description: Redcard 20-03 is an action sports game that revolves around soccer. The game features 50 International teams and 11-on-11 gameplay.

Title: L. A. Rush
Description: Do whatever you can to win back all of your cars. Explore Los Angeles seamlessly in L.A. Rush. The title was shortened to simply "Rush" on the PSP.

Title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
Description: Based on the 2005 Movie with Johnny Depp.  This game follows Charlie around Wonka's factory, helping solve puzzles, save the other children and work with Oompa-loompa's.

Title: Initial D: Special Stage
Description: Drift your way to domination in the port of the arcade classic ported to the PS2.

Title: All Star Pro-Wrestling
Description: All Star Pro-Wrestling is a professional wrestling video game published by Square in 2000 for the PlayStation 2

Title: XIII
Description: XIII is a cel-shaded first-person shooter based on the comic book of the same name, which was in turn inspired by Robert Ludlum's book The Bourne Identity.

Title: MX 2002 featuring Ricky Carmichael
Description: The first motocross game on the PS2, which included modes such as career, freestyle and stunt.  Mini-games where also included.

Title: NBA Live 2005
Description: NBA LIve 2005 is the 2005 version of the NBA Live Franchise.

Title: NBA ShootOut 2001
Description: NBA Shootout is the 5th iteration of the franchise and is the first of the series to appear on the PlayStation 2. Released in 2000 for the PlayStation and early 2001 for the PlayStation 2, It featured only minor improvements over the previous entry in the series, including a refined touch system and a graphics overhaul on the PS2 version.

Title: Death Connection
Description: A visual novel PSP video game by Otomate.

Title: Omoide ni Kawaru-Kun: Memories Off
Description: The third game in the Memories Off franchise.

Title: Memories Off #5 Encore
Description: A direct squeal to "Memories Off #5."

Title: Memories Off #5: Togireta Film
Description: The 5th entry in the main Memories Off series.

Title: Memories Off: Sorekara Again
Description: A direct squeal to "Memories Off: Sorekara."

Title: Memories Off After Rain
Description: A three volume set of epilogue stories featuring characters from Memories Off and 2nd.

Title: NHL 2K7
Description: NHL 2K7 was the seventh game in the series released on Xbox, Xbox360, PlayStation2, and PlayStation3.

Title: Tales of Destiny
Description: PlayStation 2 remake of the original Tales of Destiny by Namco Tales Studio, with renewed graphics, revised plot for consistence with the sequel Tales of Destiny 2 and the most fast-paced battle system in the series so far.

Title: Battle Stadium D.O.N
Description: Battle Stadium D.O.N. is a fighting game featuring characters from Dragon Ball Z, One Piece, and Naruto.

Title: Jikkyou World Soccer 2002
Description: Jikkyou World Soccer 2002 is a Soccer Sim game, developed by Konami and published by net mobile AG, which was released in Japan.

Title: MotoGP
Description: Developed by Namco, this racing simulator brings the excitement of MotoGP to the consoles.

Title: Naval Ops: Commander
Description: Naval Ops: Commander is the sequel to Naval Ops: Warship Gunner. It puts a more strategic and tactical focus on the franchise.

Title: Pro Evolution Soccer 2008
Description: The seventh rendition of the popular, long running soccer simulator Pro Evolution Soccer. The game is available on PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3, PlayStation Portable, Wii, Nintendo DS, Xbox 360, and PC.

Title: PoPoLoCrois: Tsuki no Okite no Bouken
Description: A direct sequel to PoPoLoCrois: Hajimari no Bouken continuing the adventures of Pinon and the gang.

Title: PoPoLoCrois: A New Adventure
Description: Turn based RPG set 15 years after the events of PoPoRoGue.

Title: Triangle Again 2
Description: Japanese game.

Title: Triangle Again
Description: Japanese game.

Title: NBA 2K10
Description: NBA 2K10 is the 11th installment in the series and is to be released on October 6, 2009.

Title: .hack//G.U. Vol. 3: Redemption
Description: .hack//G.U. Vol. 3: Redemption is the third and final entry in the .hack//G.U. series.

Title: NBA Live 07
Description: EA Sports NBA game

Title: Open Season
Description: Open Season is a 3rd person plat-former based on the movie by the same name. Developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft.

Title: EyeToy Play Sports
Description: Yet another EyeToy minigame collection. This time it focuses on sports.

Title: SCORE International Baja 1000
Description: SCORE International Baja 1000 is an offroad racing game featuring over 90 vehicles and multiple classes including trophy trucks, class I, motorcycles, and ATVs.

Title: Airblade
Description: Airblade is the spiritual successor to Trickstyle, a hoverboarding game developed by Criterion Games.

Title: Hasbro Family Game Night
Description: A virtual collection of Hasbro classic games, Sorry!, Scrabble, Battleship, Connect Four, Boggle, and Yahtzee, as well as new Sorry! Sliders.

Title: Midway Arcade Treasures
Description: Midway Arcade Treasures is a compilation of the company's biggest games from the 80s.

Title: Midway Arcade Treasures 2
Description: The second installment of Midway Arcade Treasures focuses on the company's biggest arcade games from the late 80s and the 90s.

Title: Midway Arcade Treasures 3
Description: The third installation of Midway Arcade Tresures focuses on the company's driving games.

Title: ESPN NBA 2Night
Description: Play NBA with the stars on the Sega Dreamcast.

Title: Mega Man X: Command Mission
Description: Mega Man X: Command Mission is a turn-based role-playing game, diverging from its side-scrolling roots.

Title: ESPN NFL Primetime 2002
Description: It's a football game, yo.

Title: Naval Ops: Warship Gunner
Description: Naval war game with customizable ships

Title: Pirates: Legend of the Black Buccaneer
Description: Pirate Francis Blade searches for the treasure of the Black Buccaneer.

Title: Scooby-Doo! and the Spooky Swamp
Description: Scooby-Doo and the gang are back on the Wii, DS, and PlayStation 2 to solve the mystery of a strange swamp girl and her cauldron of magical brew.

Title: S.L.A.I.
Description: Steel Lancer Arena International or S.L.A.I. is the Playstation 2 based sequel to the Xbox's mech combat simulator "Phantom Crash".

Title: Tribes: Aerial Assault
Description: Tribes: Aerial Assault is an online FPS released in 2002. It had a pretty big cult following for several years, but recently it's become a rarity to see anyone playing it online at all.

Title: Warship Gunner 2
Description: The direct sequel to Koei's Naval Ops: Warship Gunner.

Title: Combat Elite: WWII Paratroopers
Description: Isometric WWII-themed shooter from Acclaim.

Title: Crescent Suzuki Racing: Superbikes and Super Sidecars
Description: Crescent Suzuki Racing: Superbikes and Super Sidecars is a motorcycle racing game for the PS2 and PC released only in PAL regions.

Title: Arcade Classics Volume 1
Description: Arcade Classics Volume 1 is an Action game created by Play It!.

Title: Yamaha Supercross
Description: A motorbike racing game in which you tear around dirt tracks and go off sweet jumps.

Title: Ferrari Challenge Trofeo Pirelli
Description: Ferrari Challenge lets you drive just about any car you want......as long as its a Ferrari. This time, the licensed Ferrari racing game adds weather effects, a livery editor, new tracks, and a new focus on the Challenge series of cars, mainly the F430.

Title: Suzuki TT Superbikes Real Road Racing Championship
Description: Suzuki TT Superbikes Real Road Racing Championship is a motorcycle racing game that is a sequel to Suzuki TT Superbikes Real Road Racing.

Title: The Weakest Link
Description: The Weakest Link is a console version of the TV show with the same name.

Title: P.T.O.: Pacific Theater of Operations IV
NASCAR Thunder 2003
Description: NASCAR Thunder 2003 is a NASCAR game where you can ride around a track at high speeds, and create your own cars.

Title: Monster Jam: Urban Assault
Description: Monster Jam: Urban Assault is multi-platform game based on real life Monster Jam motorsport show

Title: Pool Shark 2
Description: Billiard game.

Title: Yetisports Arctic Adventure
Description: Game for Xbox, PS2 and PC.

Title: Major League Baseball 2K6
Description: 2K Sports 2006 edition of the MLB 2K series. It is also the first baseball game of the "next gen" era.

Title: Clumsy Shumsy
Description: Clumsy Shumsy from Phoenix Games.

Title: Vampire: Darkstalkers Collection
Description: Japan-exclusive collection of all of the Darkstalkers games released at the time.

Title: Heroes of the Pacific
Description: A WW2 fighter plane game.

Title: NASCAR Thunder 2002
Description: The 5th installment to EA's NASCAR racing series, NASCAR 2002 was released on the PS1, PS2 and XBOX.

Title: Mike Tyson Heavyweight Boxing
Description: Mike Tyson's third official boxing game.

Title: White Van Racer
Description: Yup, its exactly what it sounds like.

Title: SingStar '80s
Description: The fourth installment in the SingStar franchise and the first era-specific release, SingStar '80s compiles chart-topping songs from throughout the decade.

Title: Go, Diego, Go!: Great Dinosaur Rescue
Description: Travel through time with Diego and most likely save Dinosaurs

Title: Go, Diego, Go!: Safari Rescue
Description: Save the animals, save the world.

Title: Shinobido: Way of the Ninja
Description: A stealth action game made by Acquire

Title: Corvette Evolution GT
Description: Known as Evolution GT in Europe, Corvette Evolution GT is a racing game in which players must raise their stats and compete against opponents to get ahead in their career.

Title: Odin Sphere
Description: A 2D fantasy action RPG which makes use of gorgeous sprite-based artwork. Odin Sphere was developed by Vanillaware and released for the PlayStation 2 by Atlus in 2007.

Title: The Legend of Spyro: Dawn of the Dragon
Description: Third and final installment of the Legend of Spyro trilogy. Spyro and Cynder team up to stop the Dark Master, Malefor, from destroying the world.

Title: Akira Psycho Ball
Description: A pinball game released in Japan followed by Europe. Based on the popular anime adaption of the Akira manga.

Title: Dark Summit
Description: When the military takes over a ski resort, you take to the slopes and try to uncover the mystery in this story-based snowboarding game.

Title: Snowboarding Evolution
Description: From its defunct ESPN Winter X-Games Snowboarding series, Konami takes the basic gameplay and pro riders, and adds on a story of a ski slope overtaken by villains, called "Boardroids", as well as an on-board fighting mechanic.

Title: MS Saga: A New Dawn
Description: Mix and match various mobile suits from the Gundam franchise in this turn-based RPG.

Title: Sniper Elite
Description: Sniper Elite is a third person action game set against the backdrop of a nearly completed destroyed 1945 Berlin. As a disguised agent, your sniper rifle is your weapon of choice.

Title: Shaun Palmer's Pro Snowboarder
Description: A snowboarding game by Activision for the PlayStation 2 and Gameboy Advance

Title: Robot Alchemic Drive
Description: Robot Alchemic Drive places the player in control of the Meganite, a gigantic robot, and is tasked with defending Earth from the invading Volgara monsters.

Title: Fur Fighters: Viggo's Revenge
Description: This PS2 port of the original Fur Fighters updates the graphics and sound, and adds a few new features to the Dreamcast Third-Person Shooter original.

Title: Splashdown: Rides Gone Wild
Description: Splashdown: Rides Gone Wild is a jet-ski racing game and sequel to the 2001 PS2 and Xbox game, developed by Rainbow Studios and published by THQ.

Title: Diabolik: The Original Sin
Description: An adventure game based around the Comic Book character Diabolik.

Title: Bokura no Kazoku
Description: A family raising simulation developed by Millennium Kitchen for the PlayStation 2.

Title: Second Sight
Description: Second Sight is a game about an amnesiac psychic looking to uncover the secrets of his past and piece together the events that lead to his incarceration in a mental institution.

Title: Tenchu: Wrath of Heaven
Description: Tenchu: Wrath of Heaven is the third Tenchu game and a sequel to the first installment. It had the same basic gameplay as the first two Tenchu games but modernized the movement controls.

Title: Animaniacs: The Great Edgar Hunt
Description: Yakko, Wakko and Dot are out from the confines of the Warner Bros. tower once more, in this late sixth-gen title.

Title: Xenosaga: Episode III - Also Sprach Zarathustra
Description: The third and final episode of this Bandai Namco Japanese RPG series, released in 2006 for the PlayStation 2.

Title: Indiana Jones and the Staff of Kings
Description: Set in 1939, follow Indiana Jones as he searches all around the globe for the Staff of Moses.

Title: Rosario to Vampire Capu2: Koi to Yume no Kyousoukyoku
Description: A visual novel based on the second season of the Rosario to Vampire anime series.

Title: Blokus Portable: Steambot Championship
Description: A portable version of the Blokus board game featuring characters from the Steambot Chronicles franchise.

Title: Wizardry Xth 2: Unlimited Students
Description: Sequel to Wizardry Xth.

Title: Special Forces: Nemesis Strike
Description: A budget title with stealth-action similar to the original Splinter Cell and a cover system similar to kill.switch.

Title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Sakura-Chan to Asobo!
Description: A Cardcaptor Sakura game for PlayStation 2 utilizing the Eye-Toy camera.

Title: WipEout Pulse
Description: WipEout Pulse is the second WipEout game on the PSP platform, featuring all-new tracks, songs, updated graphics and HUDs, and new Infrastructure features such as custom ship skin editing (through the WipEout website) and a host of new Downloadable Content.

Title: WipEout Fusion
Description: Fusion is the debut of the WipEout series on PlayStation 2.

Title: Gekisha Boy 2
Description: The sequel to the cult classic PC Engine action game about photography!

Title: Fire Pro Wrestling Returns
Description: Fire ProWrestling Returns is a wrestling game for wrestling enthusiasts in a series that has spanned many sequels.

Title: EyeToy: Operation Spy
Description: Use the EyeToy camera to play out the role of a spy. Mission include stealthy sky diving, code breaking, face matching, and more.

Title: Army Men: Soldiers of Misfortune
Description: In Army Men: Soldiers of Misfortune, you play as Timmy, fighting alongside the Green Army against the sinister Tan Army.

Title: SpongeBob SquarePants featuring Nicktoons: Globs of Doom
Description: Globs of Doom is an action adventure game featuring 10 playable characters from the Nickelodeon universe.

Title: X-Men: The Official Game
Description: Take the role of Wolverine, Iceman and Nightcrawler and use their superpowers through a series of missions.

Title: Technictix
Description: A music based game only released in Japan.

Title: RPG Maker 3
Description: RPG Maker 3 is a user friendly tool that allows you to create your own 3D RPG without needing to know a programming language

Title: The King of Fighters 2000/2001
Description: A compilation of both kind of fighters 2000 and 2001 on a single disc release.

Title: RPG Maker II
Description: Allows you to make your own RPG's using a somewhat simplified user interface. The game uses an Earthbound(SNES) style battle system and somewhat interface.

Title: SEGA AGES 2500 Vol. 12: Puyo Puyo Tsuu Perfect Set
Description: Contains the original Puyo Puyo game, Puyo Puyo Tsu, and a number of variants (six in all). Part of the Sega Ages 2500 series for the PS2

Title: Alan Hansen's Sports Challenge
Description: Alan Hansen's Sports Challenge is a trivia game created by Oxygen Interactive.

Title: Jurassic: The Hunted
Description: Jurassic: The Hunted is a sci-fi first-person shooter developed by Cauldron in which you travel back in time using 13 different weapons to survive 12 levels of dino shooting action. It's up to Dylan to figure out what the foxtrot is going on in the Bermuda Triangle.

Title: Pachi-Slot Winning Post
Description: Koei's horse-racing game hits the pachinko/slot machine circuit.

Title: Winning Post 4: Maximum 2001
Description: Are you ready for more Winning Post 4?

Title: New York Race
Description: A futuristic racing game based on the movie the Fifth Element, released only in Europe.

Title: Robot Warlords
Description: Robot Warlords is a Sci-fi turn based strategy game that was released on the PS2 back on December 14th 2001. It didn't get very good reviews, or sales and, hence, is very very rare.

Title: Winning Post 6
Description: Winning Post 6 is the 6th numerical release in Koei's horse racing simulation series.

Title: Winning Post World 2010
Description: Winning Post World 2010 is a horse racing simulation game developed by Koei. It is a part of the long running Winning Post series and was released in Japan on February 26, 2010.

Title: Sangoku Rensenki: Otome no Heihou!
Description: Otome game about an average teenage girl who finds herself transported back to Three Kingdoms era of China.

Title: Love Songs: Idol ga Classmate
Description: PS2 dating sim featuring multiple girls, including the debut of D3 mascot Riho Futaba.

Title: Fighting Angels
Description: Simplistic 3d versus fighter for PS2 with all-female cast and an emphasis on breast physics. Released only in Europe and in Japan as Simple 2000 Series Vol. 55: The Catfight: Joneko Densetsu.

Title: Hard Knock High
Description: Hard Knock High (Simple 2000 Series Vol. 107: The Honoo no Kakuto Bancho) is a fighting game released only in Japan and Europe.

Title: Kenka Bancho 2: Full Throttle
Description: The second Kenka Bancho game.  Like the first game it too has a cel-shaded style.

Title: Pro Evolution Soccer 2013
Description: Also known as PES 2013, this is the new game of the very popular Konami soccer franchise.

Title: MLB 2004
Description: 989's baseball game for the 2003-2004 season. Released in Japan as MLB 2003.

Title: .hack//fragment
Description: The first attempt to make an online game out of the offline online game series .hack. Only released in Japan.

Title: Tak: The Great Juju Challenge
Description: Tak and Lok are the representatives for the Pupanunu tribe in the Great Juju Challenge. It's up to the player to guide these two heroes through the 15 trials in order to win the blessing of the Moon Juju.

Title: Tak 2: The Staff of Dreams
Description: Tak 2: The Staff of Dreams is the 2nd game in the popular Tak franchise.

Title: Kessen II
Description: Kessen II is a real-time strategy game and follow-up to the PS2 launch title, Kessen. The game shifts the setting from Japan to the Three Kingdoms era of China.

Title: Urban Chaos: Riot Response
Description: Officer Nick Mason and the T-Zero riot response team fight against the Burners, a gang of maniacs who have pushed their city to the edge. Riot Response is an FPS with a focus on fast action and disaster movie-styled set-pieces.

Title: Midnight Club: Street Racing
Description: Join the Midnight Club, a group of underground street racers that race for money and power in highly customized sports cars. Midnight Club was also one of the many launch titles for the Playstation 2.

Title: NASCAR 2005: Chase for the Cup
Description: NASCAR 2005 revolutionizes NASCAR video games by adding the National, Craftsman Truck, and Featherlite Modified Series to the game, plus the all new Chase points format in an all new Chase for the Cup Mode.

Title: Major League Baseball 2K11
Description: Major League Baseball 2K11 is Visual Concepts iteration of the MLB franchise for the 2011 MLB season and features the Dynamic Player Rating system that updates player ratings on recent real-world performance.

Title: Buzz! Junior: Ace Racers
Description: Up to 4 players can compete in races and mini-games using the Buzz! controllers.

Title: Street Boyz
Description: Street Boyz is a beat 'em up that was released only in Europe and Japan.

Title: SSX Tricky
Description: SSX Tricky is the second game in the SSX franchise and was released under the now-defunct EA Sports Big label. Tricky is the first game in the series to feature Uber Tricks.

Title: Rock Band 2
Description: Harmonix, MTV Games, and EA return with the sequel to Rock Band. Rock Band 2 ships with 84 on-disc songs, 20 free downloadable songs, compatibility with all DLC, and the ability to import most songs from the first Rock Band.

Title: MLB 09: The Show
Description: Return to The Show with Sony's latest and greatest entry in its long-running baseball series. Nothing gets you closer.

Title: Smuggler's Run 2: Hostile Territory
Description: Smuggler's Run 2: Hostile Territory is the sequel to Smugglers Run, You play as an unseen character working as a smuggler in Georgia trying to deliver illegal goods to destinations within 3 extensive maps

Title: Wizardry Xth: Academy of Frontier
Description: A Japanese Wizardry spin-off set in a military academy.

Title: NHL Hitz Pro

Title: Tak and the Guardians of Gross

Title: City Crisis

Title: Swing Away Golf
Description: Swing Away Golf is a golf game for the PlayStation 2.

Title: Surfing H3O

Mortars, Missile launchers, Flamethrowers, Drum bombs and more are the key to winning.

Coraline will allow players to explore and interact with such immersive 3-D environments from the movie as the Pink Palace , its nooks and crannies and apartments, and the unpredictable Other World.
